content:
本件保存七年
02-62- 2246 MEMORANDUM July 20, 2
To
: Mr. R. L. Hirshberg, Program Officer, US AID/C
From
: C. C. Chang, Chief, Second Division Original signed by C. C. Chaog
Subject
: Excess Equipment
Reference is made to the attached letter of SDC SDC-5425 dated July 16, 1962.
In the above letter, SDC requested acquisition of jeeps, weapon carriers and trucks located at Navy Excess storage yard, Shungsan, Taipei. If you concur and they are available, please initiate necessary action for acquisition.
O
Enel. copy of $DC letter cet (with copy of SDC letter) DDG JOW 2D 3D AD CSK/sml
E-16.13.2
51. 3. 100×200
國史馆 Academia Historica
115
